## Installation

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/CCBR/MOSuite-Galaxy
```

## Usage

```bash
galaxysynth --help
```
```{python}
#| echo: false
!galaxysynth --help
```

```bash
galaxysynth  "templates/2_blueprints/*.json" \
    --docker nciccbr/mosuite:v0.2.1 \
    --output templates/3_galaxy-tools
```
